questions.question_text: What are the functions of a journey template owner? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
Change only the task templates that they own. is for the Co-Owners only

According to docs:
Journey owner
Maintain plan configurations and initiate the approval workflow for plan configuration.
Update and publish changes to plan configurations.
Create and change task templates for your audience.
Add or update stages in a journey.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/concept/jny-process-owners-maint.html

I don’t know how to answer it correctly :).

Selected Answer: ABD
Journey template owners, who are enabled to manage and create journeys templates for assigned audiences, can do the following actions:
Create task templates for their audience in a simple, user-friendly experience.
Change only the task templates that they own.
Manage the order and flow of the journey stages and tasks.

So it's ABD

choices.E: Maintain oversight of journey templates and approval flows
choices.B: Create task templates for their audience in a simple, user-friendly experience
choices.C: Add owners and approvers to journey configurations
choices.D: Change only the task templates that they own
choices.A: Manage the order and flow of the journey stages and tasks

questions.question_text: What variable type is included to configure the HTML document template?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
As Gil1211 mentioned, It is A, Masked, Multi-Row and Label are unsupported.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/concept/variables-html.html

questions.question_text: Which plugin when paired with HRSD, delivers storage space, filing system, and functionality to purge and retrieve documents?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Manage large numbers of documents more efficiently with the ServiceNow ™ Employee Document Management product. Employee Document Management provides storage space, a filing system, the ability to easily retrieve documents, defining who can view sensitive documents, and when to purge documents.

Selected Answer: B
B. Employee Document Management


https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/concept/hr-employee-doc-management.html

questions.question_text: What is the minimum role required to view confidential data associated with the HR Profile?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D. HR profile viewer [sn_hr_core.profile_reader]
The [sn_hr_core.basic] role contains [sn_hr_core.profile_writer], which contains the [sn_hr_core.profile_reader] role, so B cannot be correct.

Selected Answer: D
HR Fundamentals ebook page 74: The confidential fields, like Beneficiaries, are visible only to HR professionals. So all HR professionals, so the reader role (which is part of the basic role) should be enough.
